thread.title: Watch: Another impressive preseason performance by the Trail Blazers
thread.title_full: Watch: Another impressive preseason performance by the Trail Blazers | OregonLive.com

author: Sean Meagher | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Watch: Another impressive preseason performance by the Trail Blazers
text:
The retooled Portland Trail Blazers continued to show their progress since the start of training camp with an impressive 118-101 win over the Golden State Warriors on Thursday night.
In the video above, The Oregonian/OregonLive Blazers beat reporters Joe Freeman and Mike Richman provide their perspectives from Portland's second preseason game.
